FuncDef:
The action-type decapsulate command configures the device to decapsulate IOAM packets.
The action-type transit command configures the action of encapsulating metadata for IOAM packets. The action-type decapsulate command configures the device to decapsulate IOAM packets. The action-type transit command configures the action of encapsulating metadata for IOAM packets. By default, the action-type is transit. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
